location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 101 to Rawson Hart Boddam, President and Governor for the Political and Secret Department, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter states that no further intelligence has been received regarding the movements of three French vessels in the area. An update of the situation in Persia is given including news that Isfahan is now controlled by Jaffer Khan.The letter also discusses other letters sent and recieved and details of duplicates enclosed.
